personalInfo.name: MITALI HARSH
personalInfo.title: MERN / MEAN Stack Developer | Frontend Engineer

professionalSummary: MERN / MEAN Stack Developer with 3.5+ years of experience in designing and implementing modern web applications. Proficient in React, NodeJS with a strong background in frontend and backend development. Adept at building scalable web solutions, integrating APIs, and optimizing performance for seamless user experiences. Passionate about clean code architecture and modern development practices.

Collaborated with backend teams to develop efficient database models and schemas
